The only hobby left is Board-games, which must go in position 4 (since Gardening is already taken). However, clue 2 states that Hot-chocolate is on the left or right of Board-games. The only remaining beverage is Cola, which must go in position 1 (since Hiking is already taken). However, this would mean that Hot-chocolate is not between Cola and Gardening, as required by clue 1.
